p: The commencement of SEM revealed that under optimum conditions, AgNPs derived from Eucalyptus have around 50 nm diameter [ 87]. Furthermore, SEM clearly observed the spheroidal shape of FeNPs from Eucalyptus leaf extracts [ 98]. SEM confirmed changes in cell surface structure and the deactivation of the important hospital-acquired pathogen cell membranes by using green synthesized AgNPs [ 104].
